name: Cargo Statitics
query:
SELECT 
    tb.cargo_type AS 'Cargo Type',
    tb.work_type AS 'Work Type',
    tb.container_size AS 'Container Size',
    tb.container_content AS 'Container Content',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '1' and YEAR(tb.eta_date) = '2018' THEN name
    END) 'Jan 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '2' and YEAR(tb.eta_date) = '2018' THEN name
    END) 'Feb 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '3' and YEAR(tb.eta_date) = '2018' THEN name
    END) 'Mar 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '4' and YEAR(tb.eta_date) = '2018' THEN name
    END) 'Apr 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '5' and YEAR(tb.eta_date) = '2018' THEN name
    END) 'May 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '6' and YEAR(tb.eta_date) = '2018' THEN name
    END) 'Jun 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '7' and YEAR(tb.eta_date) = '2018' THEN name
    END) 'Jul 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '8' and YEAR(tb.eta_date) = '2018' THEN name
    END) 'Aug 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '9' and YEAR(tb.eta_date) = '2018' THEN name
    END) 'Sep 2018'
FROM
    tabCargo tb
WHERE
    tb.docstatus = 1
	AND tb.cargo_type not in ("Break Bulk")
        AND tb.manifest_check = 'Confirm'
        and tb.work_type is not null
GROUP BY (tb.cargo_type), tb.work_type, tb.container_size
